name: bosomy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a woman with large breasts: She is tall, bosomy and dark, with flashing teeth. I feel too bosomy in this dress. See
bosom
More examplesFewer examplesHis secretary was a big bosomy woman.He has a thing about bosomy women.Josie is a bosomy extrovert who wears her hair in a waterfall of girlish curls.
